name: ronson66
text: Nice people here but they need to do something about their temperature reading procedure,  with touch free thermometer  sweltering heat outside and by the hot guard shack wall in full sun close to 100 F you will get a false reading and it sets in motion  unnecessary  panic mode at this very place , my company and brokers , thank God they agreed to load me being " sick " ,  later after guard change I witnessed the same situation a driver showed up  and the guard took his temperature 5-6 times and I bet he was " sick " too - I understand these are extraordinary times we all need to be careful  but I'd suggest you consult  some health professional on   how to do it right

name: Meredith Kidd
text: Ashley and Melody are wonderful and always professional. They have a great HR team. We love sending people to work here.

name: BEN B
text: Nice people but slow loading. Flying j about a mile away

name: Casey
text: Looks like a nice facility, but they make a point not to start unloading trucks until 8am.

name: Ivan Madzarevic
text: 11AM appt, driver arrived  at 7:30AM and was loaded at 9:30AM. Thank you!

name: A A
text: My appointment is 2pm but they loaded me 12pm

name: Marcus
text: Great workplace and quality products

name: Wendy Smith
text: hauled a load for them and never got paid!

name: Deborah DeeDee
text: Guy that took cans was very quiet and I'm a people person.  Can say anything negative so.e people are quiet, each to their own. Ill be back

resp.text: Thanks for coming in to see us!  We appreciate you!

name: Da Bott
text: He was an easy process turning in aluminum cans

resp.text: Thanks for bringing your cans to us!  We appreciate you!

name: Billy Cowart
text:
These guys are family
Moved up here 10 years ago from Orlando and they took me in a have been great. Thanks Keith and Wayne

name: William Haynes
text: Owner is a great guy, everyone is nice and helpful. Great place to do business with!

name: Ruthie Ribis
text: I will never go here again they are unfriendly they don't help unload

resp.text: When did you come in?  Can you tell me who was rude to you?  I want to speak to my employees that were rude to you, but I don't have record that you sold us anything, so I'm not sure who to address.

name: Rickey Moore
text: I love the people at Medders Auto Core Supply... the only Scrap Yard I would go to... and a great source for Core Supplies...

name: Jeremy Nunnally
text: Will Never go here again.  Just sat waiting to be helped for over an hour after being told there was no one ahead of me so should be the wait will be 5min. Never got so much as acknowledged after that. Finally just left because I felt o disrespected and unimportant. DONT WASTE YOUR TIME HERE!!

resp.text:
Jeremy,

I'm so sorry this happened.  Which department were you attempting to deliver material to?  I want to make sure this doesn't happen again, to you or anyone else.  Please call or come by and speak to management.  Our number is 256-892-0406.  We appreciate your feedback.  -Lea Medders

name: James Hall
text: Nice people with good business.

name: Mitchell Stroud
text: Best price around. Help with unloading either with a machine or by hand. Only scrap yard i will go too.

name: Jose Rodriguez
text: Helpful friendly staff with fast workers. I come up from montgomery cuz here i get treated right 💯 got paid good too

name: Christian Reeves
text: The experience was horrible, no one spoke English besides one person I had to go through the scale 4 times, their was no directions and hard to get help. Personally I'm never going back

name: Jerry Edwards
text: Friendly staff, extremely helpful. Dropped off a truck bed full of aluminum scrap and was in and out very quickly. Wouldn’t hesitate to do business with again.

name: Gear Head
text: Get me in and out make sure the stuff belong to me wrote me a check that didn't bounce paid top dollar

name: Jamie Jones
text: Don't have to get out to unload. They all go to lunch at same time.

name: Bdr Holdings
text: Very good scrapyard. Good prices and service. Better than Saginaw recycling by far.

name: Jimmy Cleckler
text: Great place to take your scrap to they are fair and honest on there prices

name: Cameron Ballard
text: Low prices on stuff but friendly ppl

name: Jeffery Denham
text: The only place we take our scrap. Good, hard working and friendly owners. Best place to go.

name: John Morris
text: First time experience 4/9/19. Very nice to 1st timers. They unloaded everything. I would go back. Everyone was friendly.

name: Amber Holcombe
text: Very nice people

name: Mack Houser
text: They were professional

name: Bridget Lawley
text: Friendly staff and the best prices...🙂

name: Ronald Gilbert
text: Good place 2 scrape all ways get more cash than I thought I was getting

name: Rick James
text: First time here on 9/16. These people are very friendly and also really do compete price wise state wide! I really liked the fact that there is always someone there to tell you what to do and also help unload if you are weighed down. Not a lot of yards do this.

name: Jeff Vogel
text: This is the best place to go in this area. You will get the most for your load here. Very friendly staff just a great group of people to do business with.

name: David Cavender
text: Great place to do  business at a very fair price. Very nice people. The only place I will scrape with

name: John McGiboney
text: Great place people are honest and fair

name: Dr. David Dyson
text: Circle K has a great business and staff who can take care of you recycling metal.

name: Tiffany Clark
text: Good place to go to sell your scrap. Pays good.

name: Cassie Meigs
text: They pay good for scrap metal, & they are good & honest people.  I personally would not go anywhere else.

name: Stephen O'Sullivan
text: Always helpful with unloading scrap iron or copper always has the best prices around always polite and very friendly people I personally don't take my scrap metal any other place

name: tonyverbena1
text: Great place to do buisness. Very friendly and polite.

name: Chris Faulkner
text: Great people

name: Chris Weas
text: Excellent group of people here always fair and honest.

name: David Galutza
text: In and out

name: Richard Matthews
text: The employees that speak English are friendly. And kind. The Hispanics are rude not polite. Owners they are fair most of time. Exceptions are if u a thief you just messed up.

name: Bruce Lippert
text: Friendly folks thanks 😊🤗

name: Raymond Henderson
text: Pays top 💵 and good people

name: Alabama Lien Enforcement Judgement Recovery
text: Yard employees can be a little more assertive I'm not really knowledgeable of there job description but needs Improvement with helping the client customer get in and out

name: Rebecca Becky Skinner Bailey
text: Good place to sale your scrap

name: Joey Steele
text: It is the BEST place in central Alabama!!!

name: Kenton Rhodes
text: this is  the place to go.  headed there today  with a load

name: Mark Andrews
text: Very professional. Use them all the time.

name: Belinda Smith
text: Only place we go to.

name: Danny Bradford
text: Cool

name: Otep Sotelo
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent ..

(Original)
Exelente..

name: Jonny Mendoza
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service

(Original)
Excelente servicio

name: Jessica Rami
text: Arrived here and got on the scale. Someone took my paperwork at the scale and then came back and advised me where the docks were. Docks are a little tight but you are able to maneuver. Someone will come out and break your seal and open your doors for you. They unload pretty quickly. Looks like it’s FCFS.

name: James Coffey
text: Pallet all different sizes make it hard to tarp. Pepper were nice but very slower

name: Blake Adam Norris
text: love the people who work there keep up the great work guys

name: Dean Fournier
text: Horrible. Every single aspect of this place is just horrible. Don’t deliver here, don’t load here.

name: Timothy Seigler
text:
Horrendously slow unloading. Gotta scale, then sit in line waiting for a door which can take literal HOURS. then you get to your door and will be unloaded in roughly 8 hours, your trailer will be filthy afterwards. Then, you must wait for the line at the scale to clear again. Just so you can scale out, and get your paperwork. No exceptions to the scale out either.
Don't think I'll be returning again after this experience. Management really needs to do some re-evaluating on time management.

name: I-B RA'SUN
text: not bad at all..it did take a cpl hrs but only because of the process  .they guys are working hard and they were friendly..over night parking is available but there's also a loved 5mi from here

name: Emilianoシ YOINK
text: Thank you so much in and out in 50 minutes

name: Mike Engler
text: Waste of DOT clock.  Don't come here.  Refuse all loads coming to this place.  They take hours and waste your clock out.  4 hours and not even in a door yet.  Tight docks, scrap metal on the ground.  Check your tires!

name: Lawrence Powell
text:
Getting scaled, waiting for a door and finally getting unloaded takes way too long but it's no fault of the employees, it's the process in place by management.
You should expect to be here 5-6 hours to deliver, which is way longer than industry standard.

name: Cash Rackley
text: The place was great

name: Jose Conseko
text: Long line another b's load from a broker

name: Mark Soloshenko
text: This is the worst receiver in the State of Alabama. Took my driver 8 hours to get unloaded. We arrived at 9AM and were not empty until 5pm. Be prepared to spend the whole day here.

name: Brian Chapman
text: I really don't like coming here.  Always a lengthy process to get unloaded.  Tight area to drive,  and  blindside,  but it's not terrible.  Sandy dirt everywhere,  trashes your truck inside,  and  out.  The lady that you check in with is nice if you're nice to her.

name: William Morrow
text: To dang slow  to load and it took at least 45 minutes to get your paper work.

name: Chris Trapp
text: Charlie Red Single Source  LOG : I can't  see what the big problem is, I got on the scale at 7:00 2nd truck in line they don't open till 8:00 my opponent was for 9:00 unloaded I swept out trailer & scaled out by 10:00 . The only inconvenient thing I seen was a little dust & that ain't always a bad thing it might slow some people down.Just Saying.

name: Mike Gardner
text: I load here they are always ready get in &out!

name: Jose Rivera
text: Bad customer to pickup, I have 4 hours in dock and nothing!!!

name: Amanda Newsom
text: Excellent company to work for with honest people! My husband loves his job!

name: Amanda Newsom
text: Excellent company to work for with honest people! My husband loves his job!

name: Leon Rewis
text: Unfortunately these people are more worried about what each other did for the weekend than doing there job's.Told receiving had bag of lime... apperantly you have to say it three times before they say go nextdoor to other docks

name: Jo Si
text: Tight n dirty, but its arright... enter on furthest driveway on Railroad n get scaled, follow path 2 tha rear, turn in pa n wait for a door

name: HOJA MYRAT
text:
So slowly working
Almost 4 hour waiting for loading

name: Bojan Petrovic
text: 8 hours unloading, lost my load for the weekend shame on you

name: TÄMÏLFIRE [தழிழ்தீ]
text:
This place is so messed up
So dirty
So annoying
So tight for big trucks

name: Bekjan Bektenov
text: Slow(5hrs), dirty, dusty annoying

name: Marvin Owens
text: Slow ignorant and country

name: Максим Мерингер
text: Very slow unloading!!!

name: Tommy Pate
text: I have close to 100 hot water heaters and they won't rake them.then why are they in the recycling business.if you  wont compete against wise recycling and southern recycling .you won't be in business long.

name: nelson fernandez
text: Slow

name: Michael Wheat
text: I got E strap for sale

name: Ace Faucher
text: Waiting over 6 hours To off load. Never coming back.

name: Joe Boney
text: Still VERY SLOW unloading !

name: Derrick Smith
text: Very,very slow off loading..
